net.sf.opensmus
Class LValue

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.opensmus.LValue
Direct Known Subclasses:
L3dTransform, L3dVector, LColor, LDate, LFloat, LInteger, LList, LMedia, LPoint, LPropList, LRect, LString, LVoid
public class LValue
extends java.lang.Object

Base class representing a Lingo compatible value (LValue for short). Lingo is a trademark of Macromedia, Inc. All rights reserved.
